extension.summary: Automatically fetch danmaku from Dandanplay and bind it to Kodi's danmaku engine.
自动从弹弹play获取弹幕并绑定到 Kodi 弹幕引擎。
extension.description: Listens to playback events, matches the current video via the Dandanplay Open API, downloads the comments and pushes them to Kodi's danmaku IPC bridge.
后台监听播放事件，通过弹弹play 开放 API 匹配当前视频，下载弹幕并通过 IPC 推送到 Kodi 的弹幕桥接服务。
